answerText: Abe Kobo [10] In this Abe Kobo novel, Niki Jumpei becomes trapped in a Japanese seaside village while searching for an unusual inscect. The title character is a nameless female who is forced to constantly dig sand out of a pit.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 1 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A disfigured scientist attempts a transplant of the titular body part in this man's novel, The Face of Another.  [10] Name this Japanese author of Poems of an Unknown, as well as novels such as The Ark Sakura and Kangaroo Notebook.
